00000000101000111000001100010011 # addi t1, t2, 10
00000110010000111110001100010011 # ori t1, t2, 100 SET rf[7] to 10 : = 110
00000000101000111111001100010011 # andi, t1, t2, 10 SET rf[7] to 15 : = 10


00000001001110010000101000110011 # add
01000001001110010000101000110011 # sub
00000001001110010111101000110011 # and
00000001001110010110101000110011 # or
00000001100110010000101000010011 # addi
11111110011110010000101000010011 # addi (neg imm)
11111110011110010110101000010011 # ori (neg imm)
11111110011110010111101000010011 # andi (neg imm)
11111111110001010010000110000011 # lw (neg imm)
11111110001101010010111000100011 # sw (neg imm)

00000000000101101000011010010011 # use for testing branch
00000000110101100000011001100011
00000000000101101000011010010011
11111110000000000000110011100011
00000000110101100000011000110011
